parameters.name: CustomEatSound
parameters.description: Custom sound to play when eating or drinking this item, refers to the ID of a sound script. Set to an empty string to disable any sound from playing.

parameters.name: EvolvedRecipe
parameters.description: List of evolved recipes this item can be used in.

parameters.name: MinutesToBurn
parameters.description: How many in-game minutes it takes to burn the food. This value must be higher than `MinutesToCook`.

parameters.name: MinutesToCook
parameters.description: How many in-game minutes it takes to cook the food. This value must be smaller than `MinutesToBurn`.
